description: Try our easy to follow Classic Lamb Koftas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Lamb Koftas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
1 fresh medium-hot red chilli, deseeded and chopped
1 tbs fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped
1 tbs fresh mint leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the onion, garlic, chilli, parsley, coriander, mint, paprika, and lemon zest in a blender or food processor. Season with salt and black pepper, and whiz to a paste. Add the lamb mince, and whiz again until a coarse paste forms. Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and chill for 1 hour until firm.
Shape the mixture into 12 sausages, and carefully push each long sausage of meat onto a stainless-steel or pre-soaked wooden skewer to form the koftas. Return to the refrigerator until firm.

Meanwhile, heat the barbecue or charcoal grill until hot. Lay the skewers on the hot barbecue, and grill over a medium heat for 15 minutes, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and cooked through. Serve hot with a crunchy salad and hummus.
